item.title: Three Minute Thesis Registration - Deadline February 24
item.description: Monday, February 24, 2025 (all day) - Ph.D. students are encouraged to register for the Three Minute Thesis competition. The Three Minute Thesis competition event will be part of the 10th Annual Graduate Research Symposium, scheduled for Friday, April 11, 2025.

item.title: Join the Graduate Student Cultural Celebration - February 25
item.description: Date: Tuesday, February 25, 2025 5:00 PM - 8:00 PM - The Office of Graduate Education & Graduate Experience invites you to attend the Graduate Student Cultural Celebration, an eventful evening filled with engaging conversations, delectable food, lively music, and exciting games. Take this opportunity to unwind and mingle with your fellow students.

item.title: Leaders in Action Conversation with Provost Rebecca Doerge - February 27
item.description: Thursday, February 27, 2025 12:00 PM - 2:00 PM - A conversation with Provost Rebecca Doerge on “Life Lessons: Decisions and the Path in Front of You”. Presented by the department of Industrial Systems and Engineering and Professor Azita Hirsa. Refreshments will be served.

item.title: NYS DOT Tabling to be held on February 24
item.description: On Monday, February 24th, the NYS Department of Transportation (a CCPD sponsor) will be tabling in the Union between 10:30 AM-3:00 PM. Stop by their table to learn more about full-time careers, internships, and more! Learn More on Handshake!

item.title: Join the MS in Economics Program Info Session #2
item.description: The Economics department will be holding info sessions to discuss the (co-term) MS in Economics program. Join us virtually February 26 from 11am-12pm. Take advantage of this opportunity to advance your education and career. If you have questions, contact Dr. Aksoy at aksoyb3@rpi.edu. Register: https://us02web.zoom.us/meeting/register/ASGhuLTgTtCk8KuLgzwmkA

item.title: RPI and Rensselaer County Join in Historic Partnership to Launch a New Entrepreneurship and Innovation Business Accelerator in Downtown Troy
item.description: Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute (RPI) and Rensselaer County are teaming up to launch a revolutionary business accelerator in downtown Troy to encourage investment, invention and entrepreneurship, RPI President Martin A. Schmidt ’81 Ph.D. and County Executive Steven F. McLaughlin announced today.

item.title: Industrial and Systems Engineering Spring Colloquium
item.description: February 26, 2025 11:00 AM - 11:50 AM - Professor Bopaya Bidanda from the Department of Industrial Engineering at the University of Pittsburgh will present a talk on “Innovation & AI: Balancing Efficiency, Sustainability and Developing Emerging Roles for IE, and Implications for IE Education.” Held in the DCC 324 , followed by a reception until 12:45. Everyone is welcome.

item.title: Wellness Wednesday - February 26
item.description: Wednesday, February 26, 2025 2:00 PM - 4:00 PM - Recharge midweek with Wellness Wednesdays! Stop by for rotating wellness activities like meditation, free snacks, creative crafts, and more. Open to all—take a break and prioritize you!
item.author: Community

item.title: BSA Fashion Show: Eco-Futurism
item.description: Wednesday, February 26, 2025 6:00 PM - 8:00 PM - Amid an era of rapid environmental transformation, this show asks: How can experimental and multisensory media reimagine the future of sustainable design? This year, the RPI Black Students’ Alliance Fashion Show is presented in partnership with EMPAC Research and PULSE. Reception and live DJ sets by PULSE to follow
item.author: Community

item.title: Leaders in Action Conversation with Tom Curran CEO and Founder of Curran Wealth Management scheduled for March 10
item.description: Monday, March 10, 2025 12:00 PM - 2:00 PM During this session, host Prof. Azita Hirsa and CEO and founder of Curran Wealth Management, Mr. Tom Curran will discuss “Profit with Principle: Rethinking the Role of Ethics in Financial Decisions”. Participants will be able to ask relevant questions; refreshments will be served following the session. This session is co-sponsored by the Industrial and Systems Engineering Department and the Lally School of Management.
item.author: Community

item.title: Division of Human Resources Professional Development Workshop: “Leading from Anywhere”
item.description: Thursday, February 27, 2025 9:00 AM - 11:00 AM - At Rensselaer, we maintain that “leadership” involves a learnable set of actions and behaviors that is available to everyone. In this workshop, participants will explore the tenants that comprise everyday leadership and discuss the behaviors that define leadership not as positional or based on title, but rather on values and actions.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: Meet your Faculty Senate Musical Salon - Februrary 26th
item.description:
Join us for the Meet Your Faculty Senate Musical Salon on Wednesday, February 26, 2025, from 4:00 to 6:00 PM in the Russell Sage Dining Hall! This special event brings together faculty and staff from across RPI to showcase their musical talents. Enjoy an evening of entertainment, conversation, and community while enjoying delicious food and refreshments. Don’t miss this chance to connect with colleagues and leadership in a lively and engaging atmosphere. Sponsored by the Provost’s Office.
